title: Requesting email id of a previous PES faculty
content:
Hello, I wanted to contact **Prof. Ramesh Bhat** (who is no longer at PES, but had taught DBMS for the years 2020-2022) for my masters LoR.

I tried to contact him over his PES email id ([hrameshbhat@pes.edu](mailto:hrameshbhat@pes.edu)[ ](mailto:srikanthhr@pes.edu)), but the account is disabled. I also searched online, but couldn't find any info about his current whereabouts.

So, I would be very grateful if someone could share his gmail / any other email id privately over DM.

comments.body: Had the same issue, from the 22 batch, quite a lot of faculty who had taught us then seem to have left. The alternative I guess would be to find alternative faculty you could ask ðŸ˜….

Yeah, reaching out to alternate faculty could be an option, But, in my case, I had done all of my projects under 2 Profs, both of who have left PES. So, it's really unlucky for me since if it wasn;t the case, I would have had strong LoRs from both the faculties
